DOC.criteria: Patients older 18 Years Negative urine pregnancy test Written inform consent Good compliance Patients le 18 year Pregnant patient Patients renal insufficiency , liver diseases Patients receive systemic antipsoriatic treatment UV treatment le 4 week prior study Patients use topical antipsoriatics within two week prior study Immunosuppressed Patients
